name: Toggle Arena
description:
(Note: If you would like to experience the game in the best quality, I recommend downloading one of the standalone versions of the game below)

Toggle Arena is a arena-based bullet hell survival game where you must fight off hordes of enemies as long as you can. The catch is, the arena will toggle different settings on and off every so often; making the abilities you have, the weapons you have, the enemies you face and the arena you fight in all 'out of your control'. One minute you could be shooting your way through enemies using a shotgun, the next the controls have been reversed. With over 25 different toggles, Toggle Arena not only gets more difficult as the game goes on, but as you adapt to the new rules and circumstances the arena throws at you.

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Left Shift to Sprint

Left Click to Shoot

Right Click to use a Special Ability

Escape to Exit to the Main Menu

R to Play Again after Dying
